SELECT *, (SELECT salePrice FROM tbl_sale_product WHERE tbl_product.pNo = tbl_sale_product.pNo AND progress IN (6, 7, 8) ORDER BY saleEnd DESC LIMIT 1) recentPrice, (SELECT salePrice FROM tbl_sale_product WHERE tbl_product.pNo = tbl_sale_product.pNo AND progress = 4 ORDER BY salePrice LIMIT 1) immediatePurchacePrice, (SELECT desiredPrice FROM tbl_hope_purchase WHERE tbl_product.pNo = tbl_hope_purchase.pNo ORDER BY desiredPrice DESC LIMIT 1) immediateSellingPrice
FROM tbl_product WHERE pNo = #{pNo}
